description: Whether you're a business professional on the road, a student doing homework at a friend's house, or someone simply using a laptop in a cafe, it's important to ensure the  files on your netbook or notebook are protected. Lexar Echo portable backup drives provide a convenient way to automatically back up your files on the go.Thanks to Lexar Echo SE's backup software functionality and its extremely easy-to-use interface, saving and protecting valuable data such as documents, presentations,  photos, audio, and video files is no longer a tedious task. Restoring data is just a click away.
title: Lexar Echo SE 16 GB USB 2.0 Backup Drive LEHSE16GBSBNA
